modName: Dragonborn House on a Small Island
summary:
Small Island off coast of solstheim with a fungus home and crafting areas. Has map-marker and interior works. No distant lod on objects at this time. Dragonborn required.

v.1.2-Fixed small issues, added bookshelf, Boat now travels to Raven Rock, Navmesh fixed.
descriptionHtml:
Small Island off coast of Solstheim with a fungus home and crafting areas. Has map-marker and interior works. No distant lod on objects at this time. Dragonborn required.

I made this because I wanted a place to sleep and drop off additional items. There is a fungus home with a bed and chest for storage. It has crafting areas and is a cool place to relax after a day of adventuring.

You may have to disable borders.

Please make sure your grabbing the latest file.

v.1.2.-Fixed small issues, added bookshelf, Boat now travels to Raven Rock, Navmesh fixed.
